case.question: I am a/an:

case.question: My name is...

case.question: What is the defendant's name?
case.input: <input type="text" class="form-control" id="YYYYYYYY" placeholder="First Name"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="" placeholder="Last Name">

case.question: What is the name of the business?
case.input: <input type="text" class="form-control" id="YYYYYYYY" placeholder="First Name"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="" placeholder="Last Name">

case.question: What type of property is the notice for?
case.input: <button class="btn btn-primary defendant" id="YYYYYYYY">Residential</button><button class="btn btn-primary defendant" id="INPUT ID">Commercial</button>

case.question: Address Line 1
case.input: <input type="text" class="form-control" id="YYYYYYYY" placeholder="street address, P.O. box">

case.question: Address Line 2
case.input: <input type="text" class="form-control" id="YYYYYYYY" placeholder="apartment, suite, unit...">

case.question: Zipcode / Postal Code
case.input: <input type="text" class="form-control" id="YYYYYYYY" placeholder="zip / postal code">

case.question: They owe rent in the amount of:
From the period
case.input: <input type="date" class="form-control" id="YYYYYYYY"><input type="date" class="form-control" id="YYYYYYYY">

case.question: Would you like to file for punitive damages?
case.input: <button class="btn btn-primary " id="YYYYYYYY">Yes</button><button class="btn btn-primary" id="YYYYYYYY">No</button>

case.question: Does this eviction have to do with drugs?
case.input: <button class="btn btn-primary " id="YYYYYYYY">Yes</button><button class="btn btn-primary" id="YYYYYYYY">No</button>

case.question: Has the tenant been notified of their eviction with a written notice?
case.input: <button class="btn btn-primary " id="YYYYYYYY">Yes</button><button class="btn btn-primary" id="YYYYYYYY">No</button>

case.question: Select the type of notice to send to the tenet
case.input: <button class="btn btn-primary " id="YYYYYYYY">Notice to Pay or Quit</button><button class="btn btn-primary" id="YYYYYYYY">Notice to Quit</button>

case.question: How long would you like to give them notice?
case.input: <button class="btn btn-primary " id="YYYYYYYY">3 Days</button><button class="btn btn-primary" id="YYYYYYYY">30 Days</button><button class="btn btn-primary" id="YYYYYYYY">60 Days</button><input type="number" class="form-control" id="YYYYYYYY" placeholder="Specify length">

case.question: When would you like to receive notice?
Who should the payment be made to?
case.input: <input type="text" class="form-control" id="YYYYYYYY" placeholder="name of person, business , property management ">

attorney.question: Will you need to process and deliver eviction paperwork to evict an Individual or Business?
attorney.input: </label><button class="btn btn-primary defendent" id="YYYYYYYY">Individual</button><button class="btn btn-primary plantiff" id="YYYYYYYY">Business</button>

attorney.question: The plantiff I am representing is a:
attorney.input: <button class="btn btn-primary plantiff" id="YYYYYYYY">Individual</button><button class="btn btn-primary plantiff" id="YYYYYYYY">Property Management</button><button class="btn btn-primary plantiff" id="INPUT ID">Related Person</button><button class="btn btn-primary plantiff" id="INPUT ID">Business</button><button class="btn btn-primary plantiff" id="INPUT ID">Attorney</button>

attorney.question: What is the plantiff's name?
attorney.input: <input type="text" class="form-control" id="YYYYYYYY" placeholder="First Name"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="YYYYYYYY" placeholder="Last Name">

attorney.question: What is the plantiff's relationship to the property?
attorney.input: <button class="btn btn-primary plantiff" id="YYYYYYYY">Owner</button><button class="btn btn-primary plantiff" id="YYYYYYYY">Other</button>
